verses.verse: And <S%G4903>working<s%> <S%G4903>together<s%> [with Him,] we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3870>urge<s%> you not to <S%G1209>receive<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G2756>vain<s%> –

for He <S%G3004>says,<s%> "At the <S%G1184>acceptable<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> I <S%G1873>listened<s%> to you, And on the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation<s%> I <S%G997>helped<s%> you;" <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is "the <S%G2144>acceptable<s%> <S%G2540>time,<s%>" <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is "the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation<s%>" –
<S%G1325>giving<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G4349>cause<s%> for <S%G4349>offense<s%> in <S%G3367>anything,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> be not <S%G3469>discredited,<s%>

but in <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G4921>commending<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> as <S%G1249>servants<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> in <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5281>endurance,<s%> in <S%G2347>afflictions,<s%> in <S%G318>hardships,<s%> in <S%G4730>distresses,<s%>
in <S%G4127>beatings,<s%> in <S%G5438>imprisonments,<s%> in <S%G181>tumults,<s%> in <S%G2873>labors,<s%> in <S%G70>sleeplessness,<s%> in <S%G3521>hunger,<s%>
in <S%G54>purity,<s%> in <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> in <S%G3115>patience,<s%> in <S%G5544>kindness,<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> in <S%G505>genuine<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%>

in the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> in the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> by the <S%G3696>weapons<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> for the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> and the <S%G710>left,<s%>
by <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G819>dishonor,<s%> by <S%G1426>evil<s%> <S%G1426>report<s%> and <S%G2162>good<s%> <S%G2162>report;<s%> [regarded] as <S%G4108>deceivers<s%> and yet <S%G227>true;<s%>

as <S%G50>unknown<s%> <S%G2532>yet<s%> well-known, as <S%G599>dying<s%> <S%G2532>yet<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> we <S%G2198>live;<s%> as <S%G3811>punished<s%> <S%G2532>yet<s%> not <S%G2289>put<s%> to <S%G2289>death,<s%>
Our <S%G4750>mouth<s%> has <S%G455>spoken<s%> <S%G455>freely<s%> to you, O <S%G2881>Corinthians,<s%> our <S%G2588>heart<s%> is <S%G4115>opened<s%> <S%G4115>wide.<s%>
You are not <S%G4729>restrained<s%> by us, but you are <S%G4729>restrained<s%> in your own <S%G4698>affections.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> in a <S%G846>like<s%> <S%G489>exchange<s%> – I <S%G3004>speak<s%> as to <S%G5043>children<s%> – <S%G4115>open<s%> <S%G4115>wide<s%> [to us] <S%G2532>also.<s%>

Do not be <S%G2086>bound<s%> <S%G2086>together<s%> with <S%G571>unbelievers;<s%> for <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3352>partnership<s%> have <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> and <S%G458>lawlessness,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> has <S%G5457>light<s%> with <S%G4655>darkness<s%>?

<S%G1161>Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4857>harmony<s%> has <S%G5547>Christ<s%> with <S%G955>Belial,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> has a <S%G4103>believer<s%> in <S%G3310>common<s%> with an <S%G571>unbeliever<s%>?

<S%G1161>Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4783>agreement<s%> has the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G1497>idols<s%>? For we are the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I will <S%G1774>dwell<s%> in them and <S%G1704>walk<s%> <S%G1704>among<s%> them; And I will be their <S%G2316>God,<s%> and they shall be My <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G1352>"Therefore,<s%> <S%G1831>come<s%> out from their <S%G3319>midst<s%> and be <S%G873>separate,<s%>" <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> "And do not <S%G681>touch<s%> what is <S%G169>unclean;<s%> And I will <S%G1523>welcome<s%> you.
"And I will be a <S%G3962>father<s%> to you, And you shall be <S%G5207>sons<s%> and <S%G2364>daughters<s%> to Me," <S%G3004>Says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty.<s%>
